sentences.sentence: But why does 2011 still sound like an annum out of science fiction?
sentences.translation: 为什么2011年听起来还仿佛是科幻小说中的年份一样呢？

sentences.sentence: I congratulate you. You have there a rent of nine thousand francs per annum.
sentences.translation: 您在这上面每年就得花销九千法郎。

sentences.sentence: Also, with debt out of control interest rates will rise substantially to 10-20% per annum.
sentences.translation: 同时，随着债务失去控制，利率将会飙升至10 - 20%的水平。
